1.title: Natural Enemies

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Dedra discovers Maja's shocking secret, and plots revenge with a new scheming friend. Mushiya and Maja battle over their natural hair lines at a beauty event. LaKenya is forced to choose sides.

2.title: The New Sheriff in Town

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Dedra blasts Maja on the radio exposing her past. Beautii asks Maja to invest in her business. LaKenya's new choice threatens her relationship with Maja. Salon owner, Pat, confronts Maja in a shocking showdown.

3.title: Don't Reign of My Parade

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Maja is honored at a parade, but Mushiya steals the show. Maja explodes and it's the last straw for LaKenya, who snaps. Maja tests Beautii's new concept. Dedra plans a takedown with new friend, Pat.

4.title: Rest in Weaves

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Stephen throws a brunch honoring Maja, but all hell breaks loose when Dedra & Pat show up to get revenge. Pat tells all exposing Maja. Maja confronts Mushiya about her parade antics.

5.title: World Wide Web of Lies

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: After Pat and Dedra ruin her brunch, Maja strikes back and hits Pat where it hurts - her coin. Mushiya confronts LaKenya and they face off sending a weave flying! Dedra lays plans to build her empire.

6.title: The Friendtervention

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Mushiya works on top secret project. Beautii hosts a peace offering that turns ugly when alliances shift. Dedra builds her empire but first she must work with her enemy at a fashion show.

7.title: What's in the Bag?

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Maja expands her empire with a new infomercial, but she is shocked when her enemy shows up with a surprise just for her! Pat is stunned when Stephen does Maja's dirty work.

8.title: Beauty School or Bust

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Maja's infomercial is on the line when a throwdown between Beautii and Tre' disrupts the shoot. Dedra hustles to gain support from her frenemies for her new beauty school in order to have a shot at success.

9.title: From Truce to Turnt Up

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Dedra's surprised by the ladies at her event for her beauty school. Beautii throws LaKenya a super sexy birthday bash, but drama and fighting take over when Beautii overhears Mushiya talking trash.

10.title: Beauty Boss Brawl

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Mushiya schools LaKenya in power plays then gives Beautii a D minus. Dedra shocks the ladies with her new venture. When Beautii runs into Mushiya, the two face off.

11.title: Clip Controversy

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Mushiya loses her last ally when she blows up at Maja. Dedra needs Maja but is the price too high? When Dedra jumps to the other side, Pat schemes.

12.title: Beauti Show-Down

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Beautii debuts her new products at the year's biggest beauty show but Mushiya wants to steal the spotlight. Maja saves the day when Dedra's not ready; Pat smells trouble.

13.title: The HBBIC of ATL

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: The ladies go head-to-head in the battle to be crowned ATL's Head Beauty Boss in Charge! It's an all-out war to get top honors but surprises shake the bosses. Maja hatches an evil plan; will she keep her crown?

1.title: Dollars, Coins, But No Common Sense

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: When the ATL Minister of Weaves, Maja, invites top salon owners to brunch to discuss a business proposition, jealousy and drama threaten her master plan, leading to divisions and alliances.

2.title: The Strong and the Beautiful

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Mushiya hosts a charity event at The Damn Salon, but Dedra won't play by The Damn rules. Maja salon is under siege. Beautii shares a secret with Mushiya.

3.title: Hair Show Showdown

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Beautii & Mushiya face off in a battle of styles at a hair show, while Maja, Dedra, & LaKenya watch in the wings. A backstage blow up causes drama.

4.title: Turnt Up Truce

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Maja, focused on attracting investors, invites the owners to a truce dinner, but things turn ugly between Dedra and Mushiya, and the tension between Dedra and Beautii divides the stylists.

5.title: Sex, Spies and Anniversaries

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Beautii's party to celebrate 25 years in the business takes a turn for the worse, when Mushiya reveals Beautii's secret to Maja, forcing a confrontation. Mushiya gives her husband a sexy surprise.

6.title: The Art of War

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: The stylists are together for the first time since Beautii and Dedra clashed. Mushiya convinces Beautii's client to go natural. Maja faces a difficult truth. Mushiya and Dedra's dinner is a disaster.

7.title: The Takedown

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Maja decides to show LaKenya what true mentorship looks like. In an effort to be 'more Maja-like,' Beautii crosses the line. Dedra makes a shocking discovery about one of the owner's and is excited to share.

8.title: Let Them Eat Cake

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Maja celebrates her birthday and gets a shocking surprise. Dedra doesn't attend Maja's party but leaves a lasting impression. Mushiya loses a bet and goes 'unnatural.'

9.title: The Tale of Two Weaves

episode of.title: Cutting It in the ATL (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: LaKenya finally steps out on her own. Mushiya takes the owners by storm when she debuts her natural hair line, making her a new threat to Weave Queen Maja. Drama reignites at a launch party.

imdb.plot outline: The baddest bosses of ATL's hair game are back & ready to battle for the top. Maja still holds the crown, but when a new enemy makes her a target & Mushiya's a "natural" threat, Maja won't go down without a fight! Beautii looks to Maja to invest in her new venture while LaKenya bets Mushiya may have better bundles than Maja. Dedra's new partner in crime, Tre' is ambitious while highbrow salon owner, Stephen befriends Maja as a business move. It's cutthroat & it's Cutting It in the ATL Season 2!
imdb.title: Cutting It in the ATL
akas: Cutting It in the ATL (United States)
plot: The baddest bosses of ATL's hair game are back & ready to battle for the top. Maja still holds the crown, but when a new enemy makes her a target & Mushiya's a "natural" threat, Maja won't go down without a fight! Beautii looks to Maja to invest in her new venture while LaKenya bets Mushiya may have better bundles than Maja. Dedra's new partner in crime, Tre' is ambitious while highbrow salon owner, Stephen befriends Maja as a business move. It's cutthroat & it's _Cutting It in the ATL_ (qv) Season 2!
